sources.title: Step Down to Terror (1958)
sources.description: Pursued by detectives, Johnny Walters leaves the city to visit his family in a small California town. Among the household: his dead brother's luscious widow Helen, who soon is attracted to him. Ominous events and conflicting evidence leave Helen suspicious, but uncertain about her brother-in-law as tension builds... Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/step-down-to-terror-1958/

metadata.Plot: Pursued by detectives, Johnny Walters leaves the city to visit his family in a small California town. Among the household: his dead brother's luscious widow Helen, who soon is attracted to him. Ominous events and conflicting evidence leave Helen suspicious, but uncertain about her brother-in-law as tension builds...
metadata.Writer: Gordon McDonell, Mel Dinelli, Czenzi Ormonde
metadata.Actors: Colleen Miller, Charles Drake, Rod Taylor
